Name: Gamepad Massage
About the game: Gamepad Massage is a massage game, in which you can use your XBOX controller for Massage. You can adjust the power it burst. You can even build your own rhythms of the massage using java-script. It have some builtin levels for you to learn about how to write the codes you need. **To enjoy Gamepad Massage , you have to own an XBOX controller(xinput controller).
